messages.zh: 第二关（前）
messages.en: Stage 2 (Before)

messages.zh: 叮铃铃，叮铃铃，叮铃铃......
messages.en: Ringing, Ringing, Ringing...

messages.zh: 咚砰叭砰咚砰叭砰擦擦擦擦擦
messages.en: *Electric music*

messages.zh: 欸欸欸欸欸~♪（人声vocal）
messages.en: HeyHeyHeyHeyHeyHey~♪(Singer vocal)

messages.zh: 还不起床！
messages.en: You're still in bed? Wake up!
Ah... Aiya!

messages.zh: 昨，昨晚high太晚了啦！让我再多睡会儿......
messages.en: L-last night HIGH was too late! Let me sleep a little longer...

messages.zh: 呼啊，冷水澡还是很棒！我有预感，今天会是很棒的一天！
messages.en: FuuAhh, Cold showers are still the best! I have a hunch that today is going to be a great day!

messages.zh: 先把青草汁喝了，已经让侍应生放在你的酒店冰箱里了。
messages.en: Drink the green grass juice first. I've already have the bellboy put it in your hotel refrigerator.

messages.zh: 那个也太难喝了吧！
messages.en: But that drink is hard to swallow!

messages.zh: 我可是知道的，你在昨天黑曜石节的主持节目里大喊了两分钟对吧？
messages.en: I do know that you shouted for two minutes straight during the obsidian festival show yesterday, didn't you?

messages.zh: 是，是哦。
messages.en: Yeah, yeah.

messages.zh: 虽然你不是歌手，但也要好好保养嗓子啊？不过昨天的演出很成功，祝贺你。
messages.en: While you're not a singer, you still need to take good care of your voice. Regardless, yesterday's performance was a success. Congratulations to you.

messages.zh: 哎，我不知道。
messages.en: Ah, I don't know about that.

messages.zh: 我试过了，不论怎么努力，我还是有那种感觉，我就是没法超过D.litHun.
messages.en: I tried before, but no matter how hard I tried, I still had that feeling of never surpassing D.litHun.

messages.zh: 你已经做得很好了。
messages.en: You've already done your best.

messages.zh: 是吗？嗯......无所谓啦。我决定了，之前那张合作专辑，要比上次再多做四首remix的demo，这样合作方也有挑选的空间。
messages.en: Did I? Hmm... it's fine. I've decided then, compared with that previous cooperation album, we must make four more remix demos, so that this time there is more room to choose partners from.

messages.zh: 再加量？！你这几天已经混了二十六首了，哪怕你把它当作没出席活动时的练习，也不可以这样透支体力！
messages.en: Adding even more? ! You've already mixed 26 songs in the past few days, even if you regard it as practice in missing an event, you should not overexert yourself like this!

messages.zh: 没事的，昨天晚上，就在演出里，我摸到了个新点子，这几个方向我都想试试。
messages.en: It's ok. I got a few new ideas from last night show. I want to try them all in a different direction.

messages.zh: 我已经差不多知道自己的极限在哪里了。既然我知道它在那里，我就得不断冲击它，让它变得更高，让我更难摸到它，这才是进步。
messages.en: I already know pretty much where my limit lies. Now that I know it's there, I have to keep charging at it, making it taller, making it harder for me to touch. Only then that's progress.

messages.zh: 可演出怎么办？你的日程表可是一直排到下一年啊！
messages.en: But what about the shows? You've got a schedule that keeps running on until next year!

messages.zh: 绝对没问题！演出的精力是放在另一个槽里的！
messages.en: It will absolutely not be a problem! My performance energy is in another tank!

messages.zh: 已经听不懂你在说什么了！
messages.en: I don't know what you're talking about anymore!

messages.zh: 哎呀，这么长时间以来，我有什么出差错的地方吗？
messages.en: Aiyah, have I made any mistakes in all this time?

messages.zh: 上次你可是把整个录音棚里的灯全爆了！
messages.en: Last time you blew out the recording light studio!

messages.zh: 那是法术的问题，不是音乐吧！
messages.en: That's the arts fault, not music!

messages.zh: 不过，你也提醒到我了。
messages.en: But you reminded me of something.

messages.zh: 如果理论是正确的，那我在构思和乐感上......绝对能达到更高的高度。
messages.en: If my theory is correct, then my conception and music... It can definitely reach higher heights.

messages.zh: ......源石技艺和音乐的关系只是种假说，你可不要被牵着鼻子走哦？
messages.en: ...The relationships between Originium arts and music is only a hypothesis, please don't be led by the nose?

messages.zh: 咦，我有鼻子的吗？
messages.en: Eh, I got a nose?

messages.zh: 这是该现在由你来问我的事情吗！
messages.en: Is this something you should be asking of me right now?

messages.zh: 但莱塔尼亚人做到了。
messages.en: But the Leithania people did it.

messages.zh: 音符、调子、曲式、织体，都和源石技艺的编织一模一样。
messages.en: Note, tune, melody, texture were exactly the same as weaving Originium arts.

messages.zh: 呜啊！太沉重了！感觉这也不是那么适合我的思考！
messages.en: Uwah! It's too heavy! It doesn't feel right in my head!

messages.zh: 你能知道这一点，我已经很欣慰了，呜呜。
messages.en: I'm glad you know that at least, *Sob*.

messages.zh: 我可能要去放松一下。
messages.en: I may need to relax.

messages.zh: 挺好的，别憋太久了。
messages.en: Alright then. Don't hold it in for too long.

messages.zh: 等等，可也别再把一整个城区弄停电了！
messages.en: Wait, please don't cause a blackout to an entire area again!

messages.zh: 哎呀，不会的！我会有分寸的！
messages.en: Aiyah, I won't! I'll be careful!

messages.zh: 对了对了，上次你说的那个什么克洛宁，我也见过一面了。
messages.en: Oh yeah, that's right, last time you mentioned a Kroenig guy. I met him once.

messages.zh: 感觉怎么样？
messages.en: How does he feel?

messages.zh: 实话说......作为合作伙伴，应该不怎么样吧。他大概是只看钱的那种人。
messages.en: To be honest... As a partner, not so good. He's probably the kind of guy who only cares about money.

messages.zh: 我上次看合同的时候也有这样的感觉......无所谓，赞助商这边也是塞壬说了算。我还是信得过你看人的眼光的。
messages.en: I had that same feeling the last time I read the contract... It doesn't matter though, the sponsors have Sirens on their side. I still trust your judgment in people.

messages.zh: 在外面也小心点，据说汐斯塔不简单。Grace那个号也暂时别再用了。
messages.en: Be careful when you're going outside, rumors are Siesta city is not so simple. Don't use "Grace" codename again for a while.

messages.zh: 安心啦，说了我是有分寸的，这可是堡垒中的堡垒，秘密中的秘密！
messages.en: Be at ease, I said I'll be careful, this is a fortress of fortresses, secret of secrets!

messages.zh: 你的秘密小组织，是吗？
messages.en: Your secret little group, huh?

messages.zh: 音乐人总要有自己的空间！
messages.en: Musicians must always have their own space after all!

messages.zh: 嗯？有简讯......还好，不愧是旅游城市，城际网路还是很快的嘛。
messages.en: Hmm? Got a message... How fortunate, Siesta is indeed worthy of being called a tourist city. The intercity internet is very fast.

messages.zh: 咦，这个频道？
messages.en: Huh, this channel?

messages.zh: “From Ada.Closure.Church”......咦，居然是可露希尔吗？
messages.en: “From Ada.Closure.Church”...Ah, it's actually Closure?

messages.zh: “听说这次音乐节非常成功，祝贺你:P”
messages.en: “I heard the music festival was a great success. Congratulations to you:P”

messages.zh: “很久没见了，Grace. 你还联系得到Dijkstra吗？找机会再叫他一起去做点大事吧！”
messages.en: “Long time no see, Grace. Are you still in contact with Dijkstra? Look for a chance to find and do something big with him again!”

messages.zh: “对了，注意身体:3”
messages.en: “Right, also please take care of your health:3”
My god...

messages.zh: 果然今天也会是很棒的一天！
messages.en: Today is indeed going to be a great day!
